description.raw:
Following the same reasoning as [this](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/222/unversioned-system-libraries/diff#chg-src/systems/CMakeLists.txt) `ign-gazebo` PR, now that users will be able to pick the physics plugin they want to use, we should offer an unversioned path so that files don't need to be updated for each version.

This PR also installs engine plugins in a specific folder (`.../engine-plugins/`), so that in the future, when we need to crawl this folder to check all available plugins for features, we don't need to go over every single plugin in `/lib`.

I could move this logic to a separate macro, or maybe even add an option to `ign-cmake` (we may want to stop installing all libraries to `/lib` though). For now I just left it inside the `dartsim` code since it's the only place that's using it in `ign-physics`.

With this PR, this is what the install paths look like:

```
$ find install/ | grep dartsim-plugin.so
install/lib/ign-physics-1/engine-plugins/libignition-physics-dartsim-plugin.so
install/lib/ign-physics-1/engine-plugins/libignition-physics1-dartsim-plugin.so.1.5.0
install/lib/ign-physics-1/engine-plugins/libignition-physics1-dartsim-plugin.so.1
install/lib/ign-physics-1/engine-plugins/libignition-physics1-dartsim-plugin.so
install/lib/libignition-physics1-dartsim-plugin.so.1.5.0
install/lib/libignition-physics1-dartsim-plugin.so.1
install/lib/libignition-physics1-dartsim-plugin.so
```

This will be used by [this](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/541/) `ign-gazebo` PR.
